column5: Sophisticated, stylish and spacious home in gated community. In the heart of Houston's popular Washington Ave. nightlife scene but secluded enough to provide peace and quiet when needed.  1.2 miles from Discovery Green, and only 1 mile from the Metro-Rail which offers direct access to NRG Stadium and many popular locations.  Whether visiting Houston for Superbowl, work, or just for fun, this beautiful 3 story town-home will make your stay more memorable. Don't settle for less!
column8: Beautiful Town Home in the Heart of Houston!
